channel.title: RuneLinux PvP | Spawn | 317/680 |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://runelinux.com/images/logo.png[/img][/center] [center]This is still in[b] BETA[/b] stage.[/center]
[center]Welcome people [b]me[/b] & [b]Shaun[/b] have been working on this server months, to get ready for advertising, there was few side projects but has been now finished, its just epic, featuring almost the latest game play of runescape, and of course our combat is just the best around, and this server is all around it! Its [b]SPAWN[/b] server as called PvP server![/center]
[center][b]NB:[/b] Few things you need to know before downloading & playing. [b][u]YOU NEED TO REGRISTER ON FORUMS BEFORE YOU CAN PLAY![/u][/b][/center]
Links [b]Forums - [url=http://www.RuneLinux.com]www.RuneLinux.com[/url][/b] [b]Client download [url=http://runelinux.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=10]http://runelinux.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=10[/url][/b] (Webclient will be later, when we will switch [b]forums[/b] to offshore.)
[pre] Commands ::item ::hybrid[/pre]
[center]Our server features!
[ul][li]Perfect combat[/li] [li]Up-to date animations, weapons and NPCS[/li] [li]Our server has gambling to make extra cash[/li] [li]::item command for everyone[/li] [li]All curses work, current leeches and animations[/li] [li]No lagg, hosted on linux for best performance[/li] [li]Working specials (Dragon Claws, Armadyl Godsword, Korasi's Sword etc.)[/li] [li]Working Hand Cannon[/li] [li]New Runescape hitmarks![/li] [li]Great Donator Shop[/li] [li]Premium features[/li] [li]Money pouch[/li] [li]Yell[/li] [li]Working emotes[/li] [li][/li] [li]Fully Functional options[/li] [li] Perfect Hitmarks with fading[/li] [li] Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx[/li] [li] Cache Packed 508 Maps & Objects[/li] [li] Cache Packed 634 Items[/li] [li]Cache Packed 602 Npc's[/li] [li] Cache Packed 633 Characters[/li] [li] Fully Functional Orbs[/li] [li] Fully Functional Summoning Maps[/li] [li]Clipped following using pathfinding[/li] [li]Combat Clipped Following[/li] [li]Familiar Specials.[/li] [li]Fully Functional Pouch Creating With Interfaces.[/li] [li]Perfect Ranged & Magic Formulas.[/li] [li]Clipping Around Object To Attack NPC's.[/li] [li]Perfect Inferno Adze & Formula.[/li] [li]Fully working Curse Prayers.[/li] [li]Working Curse Sap Prayers.[/li] [li]Curse Protect Range/Mage/Melee Deflects.[/li] [li]Fully Working Normal Prayers.[/li] [li]Fully Functional Quick Prayers & Quick Curses.[/li] [li]Real Soulsplit.[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b]Media![/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/16seY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dNcy7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jbVhI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rpuYT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NewQL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nmFtW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fAoKp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BAIxY.png[/img][/center]

item.title: RuneLinux PvP | Spawn | 317/680 |
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:3, topic:445711”]i dont like how people add more then they should to a 317 makes everything you want to relive a waste

if you wanna get high revision work 508+[/quote]
Who said anyone wanted to relive anything, I play them so my computer doesn’t crash from the new rs 711+ bullshit that requires super computers and connections.
Ugh, your forums linked to your server system sucks dick

Read full topic
